name: kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x
description: A better YAML formatter for DevOps like Kubernetes, Ansible, CI/CD, etc.

kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x.formatType.description: The type of formatting to use. 'basic' is the default, there is only basic currently.

kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x.retainLineBr.description: Retain line breaks in formatted yaml
(NOTE: Takes precedence over retain_line_breaks) Retain line breaks in formatted yaml, but only keep a single line in groups of many blank lines.

kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x.scanFoldedAs.description: Option that will preserve newlines in folded block scalars (blocks that start with >).

kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x.indentlessAr.description: Render - array items (block sequence items) without an increased indent.

kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x.disallowAnch.description: If true, reject any YAML anchors or aliases found in the document.

kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x.maxLineLengt.description: Set the maximum line length. If not set, defaults to 0 which means no limit.

kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x.dropMergeTag.description: Assume that any well formed merge using just a << token will be a merge, and drop the !!merge tag from the formatted result.

kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x.padLineComme.description: The number of padding spaces to insert before line comments.

kubernetes-yaml-formatter-x.includeDocum.description: Include the document start marker (---) at the beginning of the document.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
